question: The "Jaragua National Park" is located in which country?
explanation: Jaragua National Park is a national park located in the island country of the Dominican Republic in the Hispaniola Islands of the Greater Antilles Archipelago in the West Indies-Caribbean region. This national park is the largest protected area in the Caribbean Region. This national park hosts Hispaniolan dry forests ecoregion and is bounded by Baoruco Mountain Range, Beata Island, Alto Velo Island and Bahia de las Aguillas bay.
